long_description: When you're riding, strolling or kicking back, our Novara Arcadia bike pants deliver comfort, weather resistance and on- and off-bike versatility and style. 4-way stretch material allows a full range of motion; the fabric is also quick-drying, wind-resistant to 25 mph and has a Durable Water Repellent finish to shed light rain. Crotch is reinforced with Schoeller(R) fabric to enhance durability and minimize chafing. 2 front hand pockets, single coin pocket and 2 back drop-in pockets make up the classic 5-pocket style and utility; bottoms of back pockets are reinforced for durability. Rolling up pant cuff exposes reflective tape, which helps boost your visibility to motorists. Right pant cuff also features an internal drawstring, letting you cinch up the cuff and keep it out of your bike's drivetrain. When you're riding, you can tuck in rear pocket flaps to expose reflective trim, enhancing your visibility to others. U-lock holster is integrated with back waistband to make it easy to carry your lock as you ride. Our Novara Arcadia bike pants have a straight-leg, active fit with articulated knees for a comfortable range of motion; high back rise offers coverage in the riding position.
